title: How to Draw a Cartoon Cat

steps.title: Make an angular oval for the head.
steps.content: Make an angular oval for the head.

steps.title: Attach angular triangles for the ears.
steps.content: Attach angular triangles for the ears.

steps.title: Overlap the oval with a much bigger oval for the body.
steps.content: Overlap the oval with a much bigger oval for the body.

steps.title: Overlap further with smaller vertical ovals for the legs of the animal.
steps.content: Overlap further with smaller vertical ovals for the legs of the animal.

steps.title: Draw even smaller horizontal ovals for the paws.
steps.content: Draw even smaller horizontal ovals for the paws.

steps.title: Join the ovals of the fore legs with a small curved line.
steps.content: Join the ovals of the fore legs with a small curved line.

steps.title: Add a curved string-like line for the tail.
steps.content: Add a curved string-like line for the tail.

steps.title: Make an oval at the tip of the tail line.
steps.content: Make an oval at the tip of the tail line.

steps.title: Draw all the details of the cat.
steps.content: Draw all the details of the cat.

steps.title: Then erase all earlier lines.
steps.content: Then erase all earlier lines.

steps.title: Color and shade the cat.
steps.content: Color and shade the cat.

steps.title: Make a horizontally tapered oval for the head.
steps.content: Make a horizontally tapered oval for the head.

steps.title: Overlap it with a circle at its bottom.
steps.content: Overlap it with a circle at its bottom.

steps.title: Add another circle at the bottom right of the earlier one.
steps.content: Add another circle at the bottom right of the earlier one.

steps.title: Attach two triangles on the top of the topmost oval.
steps.content: Attach two triangles on the top of the topmost oval.

steps.title: Join the bottom circles with straight lines.
steps.content: Join the bottom circles with straight lines.

steps.title: Extend three straight lines from the ovals and circles for the legs.
steps.content: Extend three straight lines from the ovals and circles for the legs.

steps.title: Make small overlapping ovals for the paws of the forelegs.
steps.content: Make small overlapping ovals for the paws of the forelegs.

steps.title: Create another couple of overlapping ovals for the hind legs.
steps.content: Create another couple of overlapping ovals for the hind legs.

steps.title: Make a small curved line for the tail.
steps.content: Make a small curved line for the tail.

steps.title: Create a couple of angular straight lines for the eyes and a triangle between them for the nose.
steps.content: Create a couple of angular straight lines for the eyes and a triangle between them for the nose.

steps.title: Draw curved lines on either side of the eye-lines.
steps.content: Draw curved lines on either side of the eye-lines.

steps.title: Make small curves on either side from the tip of the triangle.
steps.content: Make small curves on either side from the tip of the triangle.

steps.title: Draw all the details of the cat based on the guide lines.
steps.content: Draw all the details of the cat based on the guide lines.

steps.title: Erase all the guidelines.
steps.content: Erase all the guidelines.

steps.title: Color the cat.
steps.content: Color the cat.
